text: iOS gets split-view support for multitasking to use 2 apps at once (reuse)
full-pick-text: iOS gets split-view support for multitasking to use 2 apps at once (reuse)
notes:
• Was originally "The Lightning port on the iPhone 14 Pro is upgraded to at least USB 3.0", but it turns out this has been rumored. This prompts a rule change. Stephen thought of a few options which became Flexies, but ultimately opts to reuse Federico's Risky pick from the last game, word for word (a legal choice under the Bill).
  • Federico, oddly, argues for this being correct, with the Dynamic Island allowing multiple app use. But the others agree that, while funny, that isn't it.
